com.egen.exhandle.handler

Interface RestExceptionHandler<E extends java.lang.Exception,T>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - Type of the handled exception.
    T - Type of the response message (entity body).
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRestExceptionHandler, ConstraintViolationExceptionHandler, DomainValidationExceptionHandler, ErrorMessageRestExceptionHandler

    public interface RestExceptionHandler<E extends java.lang.Exception,T>
    Contract for classes generating a ResponseEntity for an instance of the specified Exception type, used in RestHandlerExceptionResolver.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T handleException(E exception, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Handles exception and generates ResponseEntity.

    • Method Detail

      • handleException

        T handleException(E exception,
                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Handles exception and generates ResponseEntity.
        Parameters:
        exception - The exception to handle and get data from.
        request - The current request.
        Returns:
        A response entity.
